name: SnoValleyBridges
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Snoqualmie River Valley is prone to flooding in the wet winter months. We have several redundant sensors installed in the valley that monitors the water levels along the most flood prone roads. In addition we can predict the time when a particular road or bridge will be flooded. This skill will allow Alexa users to get the status of the roads.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
